alert.note: Alert for Auglaize; Mercer (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 8:46AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF AUGLAIZE AND MERCER COUNTIES THROUGH 945 AM EDT... At 843 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near Coldwater, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Celina, Wapakoneta, St. Marys, Coldwater, Fort Shawnee, New Bremen, Minster, St. Henry, Cridersville, Fort Recovery, Rockford, New Knoxville, Moulton, Wabash, Mendon, Chickasaw, Buckland, Montezuma, Fryburg and Tama. This includes I-75 in Ohio between mile markers 106 and 118. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. If on or near Grand Lake St Marys, get out of the water and move indoors or inside a vehicle. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
